mapper.select: SELECT distinct large_type as largeType ,large_type_icon as largeTypeIcon FROM `t_city_manage_category`

select `id`, `WMS_address` as WMSAddress, `map_catalogue` as mapCatalogue, `coordinate_system` as coordinateSystem, `map_name` as mapName, DATE_FORMAT(`collect_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as collectTime, `department` , `category` , `REST_address` as RESTAddress, large_type as largeType, large_type_icon as largeTypeIcon , small_type_icon as smallTypeIcon from t_city_manage_category where large_type = #{largeType}
